name: Camelot Galway: City of the Tribes
name_original: Camelot Galway: City of the Tribes
description:
Camelot Galway: City of the Tribes is an educational adventure game developed by Star Cave Studios. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by GarageGames.
Camelot Galway: City of the Tribes is available on PC.
